wing.name: wing
wing.transformationDescription:
[npc.She] [npc.verb(bite)] [npc.her] [npc.lip] to try and suppress an unexpected moan of pleasure as a pair of [npc.wingSize], insectile wings push out from [npc.her] shoulder blades.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldYellow(feron wings)].
wing.bodyDescription: [npc.sheHasFull] a pair of [npc.wingSize], insectile wings, which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.wingFullDescription(true)].
